name: Swarm Defense
description:
A game made in a week as a challenge and because I wanted to do tower defense.

Game can be completed in 15 minutes if you are fast.

Swarm Defense is a simple base defense game.

Buy turrets and upgrades to destroy the advancing swarm.

The best game for short meetings.

 - up to +2000 objects on the screen

 - destroy hundreds of thousands of units in a few minutes

 - game time counter

Support Polish and English language.
